markdownRemark.html:
In today’s episode we explore a paper from the mid 90s all about buzzwords and haggis…this piece of academic satire had us both laughing and marvelling at the creativity of its approach to modelling the elusive highland haggis. Expect lots of laughs, bewilderment, and maybe a little bit of learning along the way!

The paper can be found here if you would like to follow along with the discussion.

Osmosis is hosted by Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris. Find us where you find your podcasts or on YouTube. If you would like to request a paper to be discussed on the show, get in touch.

frontmatter.description: In today's episode we explore a paper from the mid 90s all about buzzwords and haggis.
frontmatter.title: I've got McNoidea what is going on in this episode
